GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an array of a single review as specified by the id parameter

review.title: Culture a Love of Agriculture With Agricola
review.review_body: You could sum up Agricola with the simple phrase 'Farmyard Fun' but the mechanics and game play add so much more than that. You'll find yourself torn between breeding pigs, or sowing crops. Its joyeous and rewarding and it makes you think of time spent outside, which is much harder to do these days!

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments associated with a particular review_id

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: Adds a comment to an associated review by review_id

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: Add or subtracts votes from an exsisting review
